sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to Kingshot Traplace ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency about how we handle data. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data.

subsections.title: 2.1 Anonymous Analytics Data
subsections.content: With your consent, we collect anonymous usage data through Google Analytics 4 to understand how our service is used and improve user experience. This includes:
list: Page views and visit duration
Referral sources (how you found our site)
Browser type and device information
General geographic location (country/city level, not precise)
Language preference
Whether you accessed via a shortened URL (pattern only, e.g., /s/*)

notCollected.title: We do NOT collect:
list: Specific shortened URL codes
Your map data stored in URL hash fragments
Block configurations or custom labels
Personal identifying information
IP addresses (anonymized automatically)

subsections.title: 2.2 Local Data Storage
subsections.content: Your map data is stored locally in your browser via:
list: URL Hash Fragments: All block positions, colors, and labels are encoded in the URL after the # symbol. This data never leaves your browser unless you share the URL.
Cookies: Only used to remember your analytics consent preference (traplace_analytics_consent).

subsections.title: 2.3 Shortened URLs
subsections.content: When you create a shortened URL (/s/<code>), we temporarily store the mapping between the short code and your original URL path in Redis with a time-to-live (TTL). This data is:
list: Stored for 7 days from last access
TTL automatically renewed to 7 days when the shortened URL is accessed
Not linked to any personal information
Automatically deleted after expiry

sections.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
list: Analytics: To understand usage patterns, improve features, and fix bugs
Service Operation: To provide shortened URL functionality
Legal Compliance: To comply with applicable laws and regulations

sections.title: 4. Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell, rent, or share your data with third parties, except:
list: Google Analytics: Anonymous analytics data is processed by Google according to their privacy policy
Legal Requirements: If required by law or to protect our rights

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to:
list: Opt-out of analytics: Click "Reject" on the cookie consent banner
Delete your data: Clear your browser cookies and URL history. No server-side profile exists.
Access your data: All your map data is visible in the URL hash fragment

sections.title: 6. Data Security
sections.content: We implement reasonable security measures including:
list: HTTPS encryption for all connections
Secure cookie flags (SameSite=Lax; Secure)
IP address anonymization in Google Analytics
No persistent user profiles or accounts

sections.title: 7. International Users
sections.content: Our service is accessible worldwide. Analytics data may be processed by Google in various countries. We anonymize data to comply with GDPR and similar privacy regulations.

sections.title: 8. Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our service does not target children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

sections.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last updated" date.

sections.title: 10. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via our GitHub repository.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using Kingshot Traplace ("Service," "we," "us," or "our"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Service.

sections.title: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: Kingshot Traplace is a free, open-source web-based auxiliary tool for planning and visualizing alliance placements for the mobile game Kingshot developed by Century Games Pte. Ltd. The Service allows you to:
list: Place and arrange blocks on a grid-based map
Create custom blocks with different sizes and colors
Share your layouts via URL or shortened links
Export your maps as PNG images

subsections.title: 3.1 Acceptable Use
subsections.content: You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes. You may NOT:
list: Use the Service to harass, abuse, or harm others
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Service or its infrastructure
Distribute malware, spam, or harmful content
Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Use automated systems (bots) to create excessive shortened URLs

subsections.title: 3.2 Content Ownership
subsections.content: You retain all rights to the map layouts and configurations you create. By sharing a URL, you grant others permission to view and copy your layout. We do not claim ownership of your content.

sections.title: 4. Service Availability
sections.content: We provide the Service on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis. We do not guarantee:
list: Continuous, uninterrupted, or error-free operation
That your data will be preserved indefinitely
That shortened URLs will remain active beyond their TTL period
sections.footer: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the Service at any time without notice.

sections.title: 5. Data and Privacy
list: Your map data is stored locally in your browser's URL. We do not store map configurations on our servers.
Shortened URLs are temporarily cached in Redis for 7 days from last access. Each access renews the TTL for another 7 days. URLs automatically expire if not accessed.
We collect anonymous analytics data only with your consent. See our Privacy Policy for details.
